messages: ... Instead God is patient with you, not wanting anyone to perish, but everyone to come to repentance. (2 Peter 3:9)

match.Jesus: He (Jesus) was in anguish and prayed even more earnestly. His sweat became like drops of blood falling on the ground (Luke 22:44)
match.B: Because you (Adam) listened to your wife’s voice and you (Adam) ate from the tree that I  commanded ...cursed is the fertile land because of you ... by the sweat of your face you will eat bread ... (Genesis 3:17-19)

message: Jesus suffer for your anxiety and his blood cleanse you so that you can have rest

match.Jesus: We know that God works all things together for good for the ones who love God, for those who are called according to his purpose (Romans 8:28)
match.B: Their father Jacob said to them, “You’ve taken my children from me. Joseph’s gone. Simeon’s gone. And you are taking Benjamin. All this can’t really be happening to me! (Genesis 42:36)

message: God works all things together for good for the ones who love God
